markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Saddlebags](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2750)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 290 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 2 sp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Saddlebags come in a pair. Each can hold up to 3 Bulk of items, and the first 1 Bulk of items in each doesn't count against your mount's Bulk limit. The Bulk value given is for saddlebags worn by a mount. If you are carrying or stowing saddlebags, they count as 1 Bulk instead of light Bulk.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Saddlebags

text: <title level="1" right="Item 0" pfs="Standard" > Saddlebags Source Player Core pg. 290 2.0 Price 2 sp Hands 2 Bulk L --- Saddlebags come in a pair. Each can hold up to 3 Bulk of items, and the first 1 Bulk of items in each doesn't count against your mount's Bulk limit. The Bulk value given is for saddlebags worn by a mount. If you are carrying or stowing saddlebags, they count as 1 Bulk instead of light Bulk.
